entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as walking down to dinner alone.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who rushed off to throw up.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who dashed off to see Professor Vector about a mistake in her Arithmancy essay.

entities.name: professor vector
entities.description: A teacher mentioned as being related to Hermione's Arithmancy essay.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student who is the subject of Harry's observation on the Marauder's Map.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Malfoy's friend, mentioned as not being present with him in the bathroom.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Malfoy's friend, mentioned as not being present with him in the bathroom.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: A ghost who is seen accompanying Malfoy in the bathroom.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts, mentioned as being a match against Harry's team.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school where Harry and his friends are students.

relationships.description: Harry observed Malfoy on the Marauder's Map in a boys' bathroom.
Hermione visited Professor Vector about a mistake in her Arithmancy essay.
